categories: Category:Unidentified members of the Ohnaka Gang

nodes.text: This Weequay pirate was a member of the Ohnaka Gang led by Hondo Ohnaka.

Around 21 BBY, when the Zabrak Sith Lord Darth Maul and his brother Savage Opress came to Florrum, they were overpowered by Obi-Wan Kenobi and the Ohnaka Gang. As they retreated from the Jedi and gang in a ship they seized from Zygerrian slavers, this pirate used a rocket launcher to shoot the ship's engines. Unable to keep the ship flying, the Zabrak brothers barely escaped in the ship's escape pod.
A few scenes prior to when this pirate shoots down the ship, the pirate's bandanna is of a lighter, nearly white, shade.
